name: Texas Fudge Cake
ingredients: 5 minutes before the cake is done start the frosting.
steps: In bowl combine flour, sugar and salt. In a sauce pan, bring to boil butter, cocoa, and water. Pour over flour
mixture. Add vanilla, eggs, baking soda, and milk. Bake in a jelly roll pan for 20 minutes at 350.
Bring butter, milk, and cocoa to a boil. Mix in powdered sugar. Add nuts. Spread frosting over a HOT cake.
